name: Dr. Fuller's Experiment
description:
Dr. Fuller's Experiment

You are a person seeking for professional help to cope with your depression.

However, things did not go the way as you expected them to be when you've asked for help from the sick and demented Dr. Fuller.

You have been abducted by him to involuntarily participate in his psychological experiment. You must figure a way to escape under the circumstances and conditions of his simulation.

Can you find your way out?

~~~

Dr. Fuller's Experiment is a survival horror game with a mental twist. A game where each step matters. Be mindful of every movement you make if you don't want to be his next meal. Don't take too long though, he might get impatient.

Are you willing to participate?

Controls

[WASD] - Move

[E] - Action Key

[C/leftCtrl] - Crouch

[P/Esc] - Pause

Credits

Developer: Croix Stu "keykflour" Lapore
